name: Adventure Island
overview: You awaken with a headache and total amnesia. You don't know where you are or even what your name is. And what is this strange power you now possess? Every time you use it, you hear a loud noise! You would like to move around and find out more, but there's a small problem. Monsters are everywhere and they're trying to kill you! Welcome to Adventure Island . . . This game combines elements of fantasy role-playing and text adventures. Discovering your identity is a mystery you must solve. Meanwhile, you're a fighter seeking treasure, exploring caves, and doing battle with multitudes of monsters. Adventure Island is a text adventure-RPG developed by Robert Lee and published as a seven-page BASIC type-in program in Antic Magazine, volume 3, issue 7, dated November 1984.
